titles.text: מרבה לספר על הגדה של פסח
Marbeh Lesaper on Haggadah Shel Pesach

schema.title: Marbeh Lesaper on Pesach Haggadah
schema.heTitle: מרבה לספר על הגדה של פסח

enDesc: A classic German Haggadah that brings down many otherwise unknown insights and customs from the author's library and from his father, the author of Korban Netanel.
enShortDesc: 18th-century commentary by German scholar Rabbi Yedidiah Tiah Weil.
